description:
## Parent Task Context (Already Completed)

> **Note:** The following parent task has already been completed. This context is provided to help you understand the background and requirements for this sub-task. Do not re-implement the parent task - focus only on the new sub-task described below.

### Adaptive Question Difficulty Calibration

**Description:** Implement difficulty assessment for Question Agent using IRT (Item Response Theory) models that adapt to user performance. Dynamically adjusts question complexity based on success rates.

---

## Task Description

did it even implement
title:
I need clarification on your request. You've provided context about a parent task on "Adaptive Question Difficulty Calibration" but your actual question is "did it even implement" - which is incomplete.

Could you please provide:

1. **The feature description** you'd like me to create a title for, OR
2. **Clarify what you're asking** - Are you asking whether the parent task was implemented? Or do you have a new sub-task description?

Once you provide the feature description, I'll generate a concise 5-10 word title following the rules (verb-first, action-oriented, scannable).
